content.raw:
Could we include a comment header into these files, something like:

drc_practice_task_6.rworld
```
<!-- 
       This file is a template for generating the drc_practice_task_6.world.
       Usage: erb drc_practice_task_6.rworld
-->
```

```
<!--

      The template is drc_practice_task_6.rworld, to make modifications
      modify the .rworld file and run "erb drc_practice_task_6.world"
-->
```
